You will get a bonus for every surviving crew member during the success screen.

ECM Jammers will temporarily convert SWAT van turrets to your side.

The SWAT van turret's weakness is the reflective camera below the gun. Aim at it for maximum damage output.
Most windows can be picked open. Breaking them will make lots of noise, and even civilians will be suspicious if they see broken glass.

Even suppressed saws make a little bit of noise. Be wary of nearby people.
Un-tied civilians will get back up and run off if left unattended. Use your Cable ties to avoid it.
The Ace of Spades Throwable is silent. Grenades are not. Prepare accordingly when you're planning to be sneaky.

Most guns reload faster when you have bullets left in the clip.
For as long as Captain Winters is present, the police will not stop the assault.
Almost all drills have a chance to break on their own. Be sure to keep a close eye on them.
Purchasing Assets in the Loadout or Preplanning screen can be a great help during the heist. Study them closely.
Know your enemy. The Medic wears bright red clothes and can quickly be identified in a crowd.
When one of your teammates has been downed, ask the rest of your team to cover you while you revive him.
While sawing doors and deposit boxes is the fastest way to open them - it's also very loud. Use the silent motor to reduce its noise.
Hostages are your lifelines. Keep them secured, away from the action, and away from cops.
Trip mines can be placed anywhere, such as vents where Cloakers spawn, or a room you don't want cops to enter.
Be careful of tossing Grenades at cops. They can easily shoot it out of the air.
Every Civilian you kill extends the amount of time you spend in jail while Bain works on trying to get you out.
Sniper Rifles can shoot through Shields and armor, and even multiple enemies.

Know your enemy. The Snipers give away their position by their laser sights.
Know your enemy. The SWAT turret can be identified by being attached to a huge SWAT van.
Perk Decks can change the way you play drastically. Choose one that fits your playstyle.
The Ammo Specialist Skill Subtree is focused around ammunition. It also has skills to improve the OVE9000 Saw.
The Engineer Skill Subtree is primarily focused around the use of Sentry Guns.
The Breacher Skill Subtree focuses on opening doors, safes, and vaults quickly. It also upgrades the Trip Mines.
The Artful Dodger Skill Subtree focuses on speed, and the ability to dodge gunfire if you have good Concealment.
Special Enemies are gradually introduced for each difficulty from hard and above.
The Shinobi Skill Subtree make Stealth easier, but also comes with tricks to be used when the alarm is triggered.
The Revenant Skill Subtree is all about survival during worst case scenarios.
The Feign Death Skill in the Revenant Skill Subtree gives you a chance to get back up on your own after getting downed.
Don't leave bags unattended - cops may be inclined to steal your precious loot.
While getting tased by a Taser, try shooting the Taser in order to free yourself.
